## Tofu burritos

[![Lifecycle: maturing](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-maturing-orange.svg)](https://www.tidyverse.org/lifecycle/#maturing)

### Ingedients
- Onion
- Garlic
- Chilli (small with seeds)
- Tofu
- Beef stock
- Cumin
- Cayenne pepper
- Praprika
- Salt
- Corriander
- Miso paste
- Oregano
- Black beans
- Beer (Australia larger) (<1/2 cup)
- Lime juice (1/2 lime)
- Butter (50g) or olive oil
- 1 desert spoon corn flour

### Steps

1. Soak ground tofu in 1/2 cup of strong beef-style stock.
1. Brown onion in oil. Add garlic and chilli.
1. Add spices and salt. Cook for a while.
1. Add tofu and miso paste. Cook until stock/water begins to boil off.
1. Add Black beans, beer and lime juice. Boil off much of the remaining fluid. Stir and let settle. Add corn flour.
1. Add butter or additional oil. Stir in.
1. Pressure cook 20mins (TBC) or slow cook (3h)

### Sources
- Inspired by: https://www.wellplated.com/tofu-tacos/


## Chilli

[![Lifecycle: maturing](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-maturing-orange.svg)](https://www.tidyverse.org/lifecycle/#maturing)

### Ingredients

- Onion
- Garlic
- Red + green chilli
- Capsicum
- Cumin powder
- Cayenne pepper
- Coriander
- Oregano
- Paprika
- Cinnamon
- Brown sugar
- Salt
- Miso paste
- Soy sauce
- 1 star annise
- coco powder
- brown sugar (1 large tsp)
- Butter
- Tomato diced (2 cans)
- Tomato paste
- Tofu (1 packet)
- Beef stock (1/2 cup)
- Beer (1/2 cup)
- Beans (2 cans; black + kidney)

### Steps

1. Brown onion, garlic, and chilli. Add in capsicum.
1. Add spices/herbs to taste.
1. Add tofu, tomato, beer, miso, soy sauce, sugarand stock. Stir until heated. Add butter and allow to melt.
1. Cook on high pressure for 20 minutes. Allow to naturally release pressure ~10 min. 
1. Tasyte and add spices as required. Add beans and cook for another 10 mins.
1. Naturally release pressure. Brown to remove any extra liquid.
